2-Man Teams: Best ball vs best ball, second ball breaks ties.

Standard USGA Formula:
2-Man: 35% + 15%
3-Man: 30% + 20% + 10%
4-Man: 25% + 20% + 15% + 10%

% reduction

Example: Average 5.5, minus 25% = 5.5 75% = 4.1

Analyzing image with OCR...

OCR Tips for best results:

  • Ensure good lighting - avoid shadows
  • Place scorecard flat on a surface
  • Capture the entire scorecard in the frame
  • Hold camera steady and parallel to scorecard

OCR not working?

Click "Manual Entry" button above to skip OCR and enter data directly. It's faster and more reliable!
